name: Resource Hunter
description:
Resource Hunter

Game made for Mini Jam 40 in 2 days.

Theme Hunters. Limitation: "Only mouse input"

Simple mouse controls:

- Move mouse to aim your ship and beam
- LMB Shoot laser
- RMB Shoot beam and scan meteor
- MMB Mine resources after analysis

Spaceship will automatically move forward. You only need to aim and it will steer to the right direction.

Grab precious meteor with your miner beam (press Right mouse button) and it will pull rock towards you. As the meteor approaches, your beam will turn green.  That means you started analysing the sample. Wait a few seconds. Time depends on size of the rock. After analysis complete, you will see amount of "diamonds" under crust. To collect them press Middle mouse button. 

Be careful! Other Hunters will try to stop you! You can shoot them with your laser by pressing Left mouse button.

Collect as many resources as you can! Good luck!

Music: Arcade Jam by ANDREA BARONI (https://andreabaroni.com/)

Font: Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/)
